New Records: Dasun Shanaka scored the fastest fifty by a Sri Lankan in men's T20Is
Key Match Events: Kusal Mendis raced to a 27-ball fifty
Sri Lanka hammered 93 runs in the last six overs
Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav added 91 runs off 40 balls for the sixth wicket
Shanaka took two wickets in the final over, giving away four runs
Post-Match Reflections: Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav staged a fightback for the ages
Shanaka brought up his fifty off 20 balls, the fastest by a Sri Lankan in men's T20Is
Miscellaneous Highlights: India needed 21 to win off the final over
Arshdeep Singh conceded five no-balls in his first two overs
